person.persName: Mason C. Miller, Jr. (Rockcastle County, Kentucky, clerk and soldier.)

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, merchant, clerk, and soldier. Rockcastle County, Kentucky, native. Son of Mason C. Miller, Sr., and Elizabeth Stigall Miller Moore. Stepson of Marshall R. Moore. Married to Paulina J. Owens Miller in Rockcastle County on November 15, 1856. Father of James W. Miller and Emily J. Miller. Resident of Rockcastle County, Kentucky, in 1850. Merchant in Rockcastle County in 1858. Clerk in Rockcastle County. Served in the 4th Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a first lieutenant from October 9, 1861, to February 15, 1862. Served in the 14th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a first lieutenant from August 22, 1862, to September 16, 1863. Captured and paroled in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, in March 1863.
